channel.title: ~~Using Scar 3.12~~
channel.description: Hey people i am new to scar. I got scar 3.12 and i got it installed. The only thing i do not know how to do IS USE IT!!!! I also do not know where to get runescape autoing scirpts. Well can any1 tell me how to use it, where to get scripts and even tell me if there is a tut how to use it? Thanks

item.title: ~~Using Scar 3.12~~
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“dragonus18, post:3, topic:149560”][quote author=davidude36 link=topic=204935.msg1805981#msg1805981 date=1191712031]
Well a start is to look at other scripts that are posted around (probably go over to the first script sections) to see how things work. There are also tutorials out there but I’m not sure where any are found.
Good luck!
[/quote]
did you even read his post? he’s asking how to use it not how to make scripts for it. tbh if he doesn’t know how to use something as simple as SCAR i don’t think he should be at these forums but w/e[/quote]
I did read his post, thank you, and I told him where he could gain some knowledge on scar. And I didn’t know any scar at all when i came to these forums and now i know a fair amount of knowledge.

Read full topic

item.title: ~~Using Scar 3.12~~

There’s a reason your warned. Just because he is new doesn’t mean you have the right to put him down for it. C0rn, pm me and I’ll help you as much as I can over msn if you want.

Read full topic
